info.author: IDA Software Technologies
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Rakun is an application development framework working on the Zope application
server. It aims to make it easier to develop extensible enterprise applications
(such as ERP, CRM and MRP), while at the same time integrating such applications
into Plone and making use of its powerful content management capabilities.
info.keywords: database, ajax, xml, uml, zope, plone, web, application
info.name: Rakun
info.summary: Rakun is an open-source database application development framework
info.html_description: Rakun is an application development framework working on the Zope application server. It aims to make it easier to develop extensible enterprise applications (such as ERP, CRM and MRP), while at the same time integrating such applications into Plone and making use of its powerful content management capabilities.
